name: SMRHN.SM.familyUniversalQuad
declaration:

def SMRHN.SM.familyUniversalQuad (n : ℕ) : ACCSystemQuad.QuadSols (SMRHN.SM 1).toACCSystemQuad → ACCSystemQuad.QuadSols (SMRHN.SM n).toACCSystemQuad

name: SMRHN.SM.familyUniversalLinear
declaration:

def SMRHN.SM.familyUniversalLinear (n : ℕ) : ACCSystemLinear.LinSols (SMRHN.SM 1).toACCSystemLinear →ₗ[ℚ] ACCSystemLinear.LinSols (SMRHN.SM n).toACCSystemLinear

name: SMRHN.SM.familyUniversalAF
declaration:
